languages.text: Whenever the wearer {g|Encyclopedia:Reload}reloads{/g} their weapon, they gain +10% {g|Encyclopedia:DetailsOfTheCoverGlossary}cover efficiency{/g} and +10% {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hit chance{/g} until the start of their next {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}. These effects do not stack.

traits.locale_text: Whenever the wearer reloads their weapon, they gain +10% cover efficiency and +10% hit chance until the start of their next turn. These effects don't stack.

Whenever the wearer {g|Encyclopedia:Reload}reloads{/g} their weapon, they gain +10% {g|Encyclopedia:DetailsOfTheCoverGlossary}cover efficiency{/g} and +10% {g|Encyclopedia:HitChance}hit chance{/g} until the start of their next {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}. These effects don't stack.

Whenever the wearer {g|Encyclopedia:Reload}reloads{/g} their weapon, they gain +10% {g|Encyclopedia:DetailsOfTheCoverGlossary}cover efficiency{/g} and +10% {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hit chance{/g} until the start of their next {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}. These effects do not stack.

Whenever the wearer {g|Encyclopedia:Reload}reloads{/g} their weapon, they gain +10% {g|Encyclopedia:DetailsOfTheCoverGlossary}cover efficiency{/g} and +10% {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hit chance{/g} until the start of their next {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}. These effects do not stack.

languages.text: 每当装备者{g|Encyclopedia:Reload}重新装填{/g}武器时，都会获得+10%{g|Encyclopedia:DetailsOfTheCoverGlossary}掩体效果{/g}与+10%{g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}命中率{/g}，效果持续至下个{g|Encyclopedia:Turn}回合{/g}开始。上述加成效果无法叠加。
languages.original_text: Whenever the wearer {g|Encyclopedia:Reload}reloads{/g} their weapon, they gain +10% {g|Encyclopedia:DetailsOfTheCoverGlossary}cover efficiency{/g} and +10% {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hit chance{/g} until the start of their next {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}. These effects do not stack.

traits.locale_text: 每当装备者{g|Encyclopedia:Reload}重新装填{/g}武器时，都会获得+10%{g|Encyclopedia:DetailsOfTheCoverGlossary}掩体效果{/g}与+10%{g|Encyclopedia:HitChance}命中率{/g}，效果持续至下个{g|Encyclopedia:Turn}回合{/g}开始。上述加成效果无法叠加。

languages.text: При {g|Encyclopedia:Reload}перезарядке{/g} оружия персонаж получает +10% к {g|Encyclopedia:DetailsOfTheCoverGlossary}эффективности укрытия{/g} и +10% к {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}шансу попадания{/g} до начала своего следующего {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}хода{/g}. Эти эффекты не суммируются.
languages.original_text: Whenever the wearer {g|Encyclopedia:Reload}reloads{/g} their weapon, they gain +10% {g|Encyclopedia:DetailsOfTheCoverGlossary}cover efficiency{/g} and +10% {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hit chance{/g} until the start of their next {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}. These effects do not stack.

traits.locale_text: При {g|Encyclopedia:Reload}перезарядке{/g} оружия персонаж получает +10% к {g|Encyclopedia:DetailsOfTheCoverGlossary}эффективности укрытия{/g} и +10% к {g|Encyclopedia:HitChance}шансу попадания{/g} до начала своего следующего {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}хода{/g}. Эти эффекты не суммируются.

При {g|Encyclopedia:Reload}перезарядке{/g} оружия персонаж получает +10% к {g|Encyclopedia:DetailsOfTheCoverGlossary}эффективности укрытия{/g} и +10% к {g|Encyclopedia:HitChance}шансу попадания{/g} до начала своего следующего {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}хода{/g}. Эти эффекты не суммируются.

languages.text: 武器を{g|Encyclopedia:Reload}リロード{/g}する度、次の{g|Encyclopedia:Turn}ターン{/g}の最初まで{g|Encyclopedia:DetailsOfTheCoverGlossary}遮蔽効率{/g}と{g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}命中率{/g}+10%これらの効果は累積しない。
languages.original_text: Whenever the wearer {g|Encyclopedia:Reload}reloads{/g} their weapon, they gain +10% {g|Encyclopedia:DetailsOfTheCoverGlossary}cover efficiency{/g} and +10% {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hit chance{/g} until the start of their next {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}. These effects do not stack.

traits.locale_text: 武器を{g|Encyclopedia:Reload}リロード{/g}する度、次の{g|Encyclopedia:Turn}ターン{/g}の最初まで{g|Encyclopedia:DetailsOfTheCoverGlossary}遮蔽効率{/g}と{g|Encyclopedia:HitChance}命中率{/g}+10%これらの効果は累積しない。

languages.text: Cada vez que el portador {g|Encyclopedia:Reload}recarga{/g} su arma, gana +10 % de {g|Encyclopedia:DetailsOfTheCoverGlossary}eficacia de cobertura{/g} y +10 % de {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}probabilidad de impacto{/g} hasta el comienzo de su próximo {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turno{/g}. Estos efectos no son acumulativos.
languages.original_text: Whenever the wearer {g|Encyclopedia:Reload}reloads{/g} their weapon, they gain +10% {g|Encyclopedia:DetailsOfTheCoverGlossary}cover efficiency{/g} and +10% {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hit chance{/g} until the start of their next {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}. These effects do not stack.

traits.locale_text: Cada vez que el portador {g|Encyclopedia:Reload}recarga{/g} su arma, gana +10 % de {g|Encyclopedia:DetailsOfTheCoverGlossary}eficacia de cobertura{/g} y +10 % de {g|Encyclopedia:HitChance}probabilidad de impacto{/g} hasta el comienzo de su próximo {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turno{/g}. Estos efectos no son acumulativos.

languages.text: Wenn der Träger seine Waffe {g|Encyclopedia:Reload}nachlädt{/g}, erhält er bis zum Beginn seines nächsten {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}Zuges{/g} +10 % {g|Encyclopedia:DetailsOfTheCoverGlossary}Deckungseffizienz{/g} und +10 % {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}Trefferchance{/g}. Diese Effekte sind nicht stapelbar.
languages.original_text: Whenever the wearer {g|Encyclopedia:Reload}reloads{/g} their weapon, they gain +10% {g|Encyclopedia:DetailsOfTheCoverGlossary}cover efficiency{/g} and +10% {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hit chance{/g} until the start of their next {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}. These effects do not stack.

traits.locale_text: Immer wenn der Träger seine Waffe {g|Encyclopedia:Reload}nachlädt{/g}, erhält er +10 % {g|Encyclopedia:DetailsOfTheCoverGlossary}Deckungseffizienz{/g} und +10 % {g|Encyclopedia:HitChance}Trefferchance{/g} bis zum Beginn seines nächsten {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}Zuges{/g}. Diese Effekte addieren sich nicht.

languages.text: Lorsque l'utilisateur {g|Encyclopedia:Reload}recharge{/g} son arme, l'{g|Encyclopedia:DetailsOfTheCoverGlossary}efficacité de sa couverture{/g} et ses {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}chances de toucher{/g} augmentent de +10 % jusqu'au début de son {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}tour{/g} suivant. Ces effets ne sont pas cumulables.
languages.original_text: Whenever the wearer {g|Encyclopedia:Reload}reloads{/g} their weapon, they gain +10% {g|Encyclopedia:DetailsOfTheCoverGlossary}cover efficiency{/g} and +10% {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hit chance{/g} until the start of their next {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}. These effects do not stack.

traits.locale_text: Lorsque l'utilisateur {g|Encyclopedia:Reload}recharge{/g} son arme, l'{g|Encyclopedia:DetailsOfTheCoverGlossary}efficacité de sa couverture{/g} et ses {g|Encyclopedia:HitChance}chances d'infliger un coup{/g} augmentent de +10 % jusqu'au début de son {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}tour{/g} suivant. Ces effets ne sont pas cumulables.

languages.text: Takan kişi, silahını {g|Encyclopedia:Reload}doldurduğunda{/g} +%10 {g|Encyclopedia:DetailsOfTheCoverGlossary}siper etkililiği{/g} ve +%10 {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}vuruş olasılığı{/g} kazanır. Bu etkiler, bir sonraki {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turunun{/g} başlangıcına dek sürer. Etkiler üst üste birikmez.
languages.original_text: Whenever the wearer {g|Encyclopedia:Reload}reloads{/g} their weapon, they gain +10% {g|Encyclopedia:DetailsOfTheCoverGlossary}cover efficiency{/g} and +10% {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hit chance{/g} until the start of their next {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}. These effects do not stack.
